item.title: Sausage and Cabbage
item.description: Ingredients Head of cabbage Onion Clove of garlic (1 tsp of minced garlic) 1 or 2 packages of sausage; around 1 to 1.5 lbs of sausage. 1⁄2 cup of water Salt Pepper Instructions Turn the instant pot onto saut√© with some vegetable oil. Cut up the onion, cabbage, and sausage. I normally cut the cabbage into eigths. Put the onion and sausage into the pot. Saute for a couple of minutes, just to cook and brown it.
